member.name: T:Statistics.Printer
member.summary: Provides static methods to print collection statistics.

member.name: M:Statistics.Printer.PrintMin(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the minimum value found in the up to on the console.
member.param: The position to which to look for the minimum value.

member.name: M:Statistics.Printer.PrintMax(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the maximum value found in the up to on the console.
member.param: The position to which to look for the maximum value.

member.name: M:Statistics.Printer.PrintAverage(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the average value of the up to on the console.
member.param: The position to which to calculate the average value.

member.name: M:Statistics.Printer.PrintStatistics(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},System.Int32)
member.summary: Prints the statistics of up to on the console.
member.param: The position to which to calculate the statistics.
